object.name: locstridProfilerSong
object.desc: String used to display the song name on the profiler of a music object.

object.name: locstridProfilerArtist
object.desc: String used to display the artist name on the profiler of a music object.

field.name: itemsMusicCollectibleToken
field.desc: Token that will be given when unlocking a song.

field.name: itemsDummyMusicReward
field.desc: Item used to override the music library DB song inside, every time the music entity changes its song it overrides its reward.

field.name: musicobjectdataMusicPlayerConfig
field.desc: Configuration for the music player related to the music system.

field.name: fPlaylistPreviewDelay
field.desc: Delay to play the preview song on the playlist.

field.name: fMusicFadeOutOnMissionStart
field.desc: Fade out applied to audio files and music player when the mission starts.

object.name: DefaultStore
object.desc: This songs will be flagged as default avalable to buy on the music store

object.name: DefaultPlayerMusicLibrary
object.desc: This songs will be added by default on the music library of the player

object.name: DefaultPlayerPlaylist
object.desc: This songs will be added by default on the playlist of the player

field.name: fAudioFileIntroductionDelay
field.desc: Delay to play the audio file while displaying the UI introduction.

object.name: locstridAudioFileTitle
object.desc: Tittle of the hacking panel audio file, it looks like 'Audio file: name of the file'

object.name: locstridAudiofileSkip
object.desc: Secondary text of the hackin panel audio file on bottom side, it displays the skip button and the text 'SKIP AUDIO FILE'

object.name: locstridAudiofileOpenMusicPlayer
object.desc: Notification data to display when the audio file is finished.

object.name: locstridAudiofileUnlockMultipleFiles
object.desc: First line text when unlocking many audio files at once by using AudioFileController domino box.

field.name: fMusicVolumeOnAudioFilePlaying
field.desc: The music will be set to this volume when playing an audio file in dB (decibels, from -96.0 to 0.0f).

field.name: sndAudioFileInSoundId
field.desc: Sound to play when audio file is hacked.

field.name: sndAudioFileOutSoundId
field.desc: Sound to play when audio file is finished.

field.name: itemsMusicCollectibleToken
field.desc: Token that will be given when unlocking an audio file.
